Mad.author: Steve
Mad.text: The frequency of new bugs keeps increasing!

Mad.author: Steve
Mad.text: We still haven't heard from the marketing team regarding the new ad campaign.

Mad.author: Andrew
Mad.text: There are some contradicting feature requests in the backlog.

Sad.author: Mike
Sad.text: I am not fully comfortable in my new role yet.

Sad.author: Steve
Sad.text: Yet another team member left the team...

Glad.author: Mike
Glad.text: I am glad to receive such a warm welcome to the team <3

Glad.author: Steve
Glad.text: We got great user feedback on the last update! :D

Glad.author: Sandy
Glad.text: Mike stepped up as new Scrum Master :)
